channel.title: Call For Authors on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in Call For Authors on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Call for Writers: Share Your Experiences and Help New Users
item.description: PowerShell Magazine is starting a series of posts with personal stories about people’s PowerShell beginnings entitled “How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Windows PowerShell”.
